entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries early this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
